tests.title: End to end maize diagnosis for cutworms
questions: holes in the leaves of seedlings

tests.title: End to end maize diagnosis for weevils
end to end maize diagnosis for fusarium ear rot
questions: Yellowish/reddish grains with a white powdery substance

tests.title: end to end maize diagnosis for stalk borer
end to end maize diagnosis for large grain borer
questions: large holes caused by black insect

tests.title: end to end maize diagnosis for common smut
questions: growth on the cob with black powdery substance

tests.title: end to end maize diagnosis for white grubs
end to end maize diagnosis for  wireworms
end to end maize diagnosis for grey leaf spot
questions: rectangular grey to brown spots on the leaves

tests.title: end to end maize diagnosis for army worms
questions: holes in leaves caused by black caterpillars that move in large groups and destroys almost the whole field

tests.title: end to end maize diagnosis for maize streak virus
end to end end to end potato diagnosis for late blight
questions: big brown/grey patch on the leaf

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for early blight
questions: brown spots and leaves turning yellow

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for tuber moth
questions: white worm with a brown head

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for aphids
questions: leaf curling and small green insects

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for mites
questions: red insects that look like spiders that cause the leaf to turn red

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for blackleg
questions: potato stem has turned to black

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for growth cracks
questions: potato is showing signs of cracks or splitting

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for black heart
questions: potato is turning black at the center when cut into half

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for bacterial wilt
questions: plants have turned yellow and look like they are dying

tests.title: end to end end to end potato diagnosis for root-knot nematode
questions: potato roots are swollen and have things that look like knots
